alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Grayson (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Carroll and northeastern Grayson Counties and the City of Galax through 400 PM EDT... At 322 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fries, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Galax... Hillsville... Fries... Fancy Gap... Byllesby... Sylvatus... and Gladesboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
